description: jQuery CSS module source code implementing style manipulation, CSS property hooks, dimension calculations, and show/hide toggling.

methods.name: vendorPropName
methods.description: Returns vendor-prefixed CSS property name if necessary.

methods.name: setPositiveNumber
methods.description: Adjusts a CSS value to be a positive number with units.

methods.name: augmentWidthOrHeight
methods.description: Calculates width or height including padding, border, margin as needed.

methods.name: getWidthOrHeight
methods.description: Gets the computed width or height of an element, considering box-sizing.

methods.name: showHide
methods.description: Shows or hides a list of elements by adjusting display style.
